content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE access_z309_tmeterreading (
	[N_PROP] varchar(100),
	[N_PROP_METE] varchar(100),
	[N_METE_READ] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_TOLE] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_TYPE] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_CONS] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_STAT] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_CANT_READ] varchar(100),
	[C_PDE_READ_METH] varchar(100),
	[Q_METE_READ] varchar(100),
	[D_METE_READ] varchar(100),
	[T_METE_READ_TIME] varchar(100),
	[Q_METE_READ_CONS] varchar(100),
	[Q_METE_READ_DAYS] varchar(100),
	[F_READ_COMM_CODE] varchar(100),
	[F_READ_COMM_FREE] varchar(100),
	[Q_PDE_HIGH_LOW] varchar(100),
	[Q_PDE_REEN_COUN] varchar(100),
	[F_PDE_AUXI_READ] varchar(100),
	[D_METE_READ_UPDA] varchar(100),
	[_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
	[year] varchar(4),
	[month] varchar(2),
	[day] varchar(2)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'access/z309_tmeterreading/delta/part-00000-9fe96860-1092-4741-9730-2a0652c44e53-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM access_z309_tmeterreading
GO
